name: Cáithnín
description:
"Cáithnín” is a single player 3D atmospheric flying simulation where the player controls a “Cáithnín” or a particle.

Storyworld: A toxic gas attack has destroyed a city in the 1950’s. The city struggles, but grows upwards, away from the destruction. It is discovered that the gas, when diluted,  can cause vivid, lucid dreams when inhaled. The city revels around an industry that promoted the gas as a past time, pain relief, and entertainment. A modernist city, floating on the dreams of its citizens, ready to explore. 

This was a world building solo project and I worked on every aspect of the game, from concept to finished prototype.
